data.persona: I am a visitor to the castle of the King. I am not normally in this area. I am thankful to be here in the area.
data.description:
You are in the sitting room.
the sitting room has a goat's skin as a sitting place in front of the cottage's fireplace that is just a fire burning in a pit. It is incredibly small
There's a goblet, a blanket, a bed, and a firewood here.
The her maid and the traveler are here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief, a flower, and an umbrella, and wearing a ceremonial hat and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want the maid to show the handkerchief to the traveler
data.mid_motivation: I plan to join the traveler's party today
data.long_motivation: I hope to safely get to my home in a few weeks
